strings:
<voice_0x01001188><se_low>*: Well done, child of my children's children.
You have reached the inner sanctum.

<voice_0x01001189><se_low>*: In so doing, you have completed the
trials and proven your worthiness as heir.
Now harken to my words.
<voice_0x0100118A><se_low>*: Noble blood courses through your veins.

<voice_0x0100118B><se_low>*: As a trusted descendant, you have an obligation to protect this noble heritage.
You may never permit this bloodline to end.

<voice_0x0100118C><se_low>*: For whilst it endures,
the world shall remain at peace.

<voice_0x0100118E><se_def>Cash: Sure looks that way.
That crystal seems to be enchanted with some sort of power that shows an image to us.

<voice_0x0100118F><se_high>Carrie: He said not to let the bloodline die out,
but isn't that impossible? We were adopted,
after all.

<voice_0x01001190><se_high>Carrie: The family bloodline ended when Father
was killed.

<voice_0x01001191><se_def>Cash: Well, we can't do anything about that now.
All we can do is work together to make the casino even more successful.
<voice_0x01001192><se_def>Cash: Anyway, we've heard what he had to say. Let's go home. And don't forget, travellers! You're still on the payroll as bodyguards until we get back!
<Cap><leader> touches the crystal ball that sits on the pedestal.
